committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for the addition of the Truman Farm Home to the Harry S Truman National Historic Site in the State of Missouri, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the Truman Farm Home in Grandview, Jackson County, Missouri, to add to the Harry S. Truman National Historic Site.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the addition of the Truman Farm Home to the Harry S Truman National Historic Site in the State of Missouri, and for other purposes.
